description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3h49v","text":"This protocol outlines the steps used to perform standard immunohistochemistry for antibody validation in frozen human liver tissue samples, performed at Molecular Pathology Core facility at Columbia University.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8s34e","text":"Cryosection the frozen liver tissue at 5µm thickness and place it on charged slide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78d0n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rvd9","text":"Fix the tissue sections in cold acetone for 15 minutes   . Alternatively, fix with 1% paraformaldehyde at 4C for 15min followed by ice-cold methanol at -20C for 5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bfin9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"F43262E0F3D111EC9C6ED1FC1D8E489E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4do3","text":"Air dry the sections at room temperature for 2 minutes    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1hr0h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"0ED8BE50F3D211EC9C6ED1FC1D8E489E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1kbv","text":"Incubate the slides in 0.3% hydrogen peroxide in PBS for 5 minutes  to block peroxidase activity","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"srqn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"18B639C0F3D211EC9C6ED1FC1D8E489E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7hgih","text":"Wash slides with PBS 3 times, for 5 minutes each   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"80oe2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2648D880F3D311EC9C6ED1FC1D8E489E","id":0,"label":"X3","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83d8h","text":"Block the tissue sections in 10% normal goat serum or 5%Horse serum with 0.1%BSA for 20 minutes   ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":96,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fgmp1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"5BC47220F3D411EC9C6ED1FC1D8E489E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9k4jc","text":"Incubate the tissue sections with primary antibody diluted in DAKO antibody diluent at room temperature for 1.5-2 hours     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":122,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2mma7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"619984B0F3D411EC9C6ED1FC1D8E489E","id":0,"label":"-","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"173E7290F3ED11ECACC433791CB93ABB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ulb6","text":"Wash the slides with PBS 3 times, for 5 minutes each    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5mue9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"1F6805D0F3D411EC9C6ED1FC1D8E489E","id":0,"label":"each - 3 times","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93qjn","text":"Incubate the tissue sections with biotinylated secondary antibody diluted in PBS at room temperature for 30-45 minutes     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":119,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":121,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"crttr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"6733D830F3D411EC9C6ED1FC1D8E489E","id":0,"label":"-","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"25A9DA90F3ED11ECACC433791CB93ABB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1v9n5","text":"Wash the slides with PBS 3 times, for 5 minutes each    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"D7A2B2C3F3D911EC8BD90A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"each - 3 times","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"p4g6","text":"Incubate the tissue sections with ABC (Avidin-Biotin complex) peroxidase solution at room temperature for 30 minutes    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":118,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2cp6v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"2BC60D70F3DB11EC9A9B47AF65B9F890","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6e3fs","text":"Wash the slides with PBS 3 times, 5 minutes each    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4h1hr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"D0785F7EF3E511ECBF610A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"each - 3 times","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33k0h","text":"Incubate the tissue sections with DAB (3,3’-diaminobenzidine) peroxidase substrate solution until desired color intensity is reached and immerse slides in distilled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3a6g1","text":"Counterstain with hematoxylin and rinse with distilled water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8j44v","text":"Dehydrate the sections using 95% ethanol followed by 100% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c9il0","text":"Clear with xylene and mount coverslip using mounting medium","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Immunohistochemistry of liver tissue sections
